content.raw:
I’d really like to get this pull request rolling again. As we have shifted to taking about 20 images instead of 2 per shot the caching solution is also starting to feel a bit slow \(I really don't want to know what the timing is with unmodified lyse\).

It seemed that you\(@cbillington \) had some ideas on how to further improve the speed of the caching feature. Could you give me a rundown of the ideas you had? I’d also like to get this into the mainline code soon as it is a feature our lab very much depends on.
content.html:
I’d really like to get this pull request rolling again. As we have shifted to taking about 20 images instead of 2 per shot the caching solution is also starting to feel a bit slow (I really don't want to know what the timing is with unmodified lyse).

It seemed that you(@cbillington ) had some ideas on how to further improve the speed of the caching feature. Could you give me a rundown of the ideas you had? I’d also like to get this into the mainline code soon as it is a feature our lab very much depends on.
